steps.title: 安装Toolkit
commands:
#conda所在目录需有755权限
conda config --add channels https://repo.huaweicloud.com/ascend/repos/conda/ 
conda install ascend::cann-toolkit==8.5.0
conda install ascend::cann-310b-ops==8.5.0

steps.title: 安装后验证
commands:
source /home/miniconda3/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 配置用户属组
commands:
groupadd HwHiAiUser
useradd -g HwHiAiUser -d /home/HwHiAiUser -m HwHiAiUser -s /bin/bash

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands:
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y gcc python3 python3-pip linux-headers-$(uname -r)

steps.title: 安装CANN（驱动+Toolkit）
commands:
#Ascend-cann为驱动、Toolkit合一包
wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/CANN/CANN%208.5.T63/Ascend-cann_8.5.0_linux-aarch64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann_8.5.0_linux-aarch64.run --install

wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/CANN/CANN%208.5.T63/Ascend-cann-310b-ops_8.5.0_linux-aarch64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann-310b-ops_8.5.0_linux-aarch64.run --install

steps.title: 安装后验证
commands:
# 配置环境变量(如下命令以root用户为例，请以实际安装路径为准)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 安装Toolkit
commands:
#conda所在目录需有755权限
conda config --add channels https://repo.huaweicloud.com/ascend/repos/conda/

#conda所在目录需有755权限
conda config --add channels https://repo.huaweicloud.com/ascend/repos/conda/ 
conda install ascend::cann-toolkit==8.5.0
conda install ascend::cann-310p-ops==8.5.0

steps.title: 安装后验证
commands:
source /home/miniconda3/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 配置用户属组
commands:
groupadd HwHiAiUser
useradd -g HwHiAiUser -d /home/HwHiAiUser -m HwHiAiUser -s /bin/bash

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands:
sudo yum makecache
sudo yum install -y gcc python3 python3-pip kernel-headers-$(uname -r) kernel-devel-$(uname -r)

steps.title: 安装NPU驱动
commands:
sudo curl https://repo.oepkgs.net/ascend/cann/ascend.repo -o /etc/yum.repos.d/ascend.repo && yum makecache 
sudo yum install -y Ascend-hdk-310p-npu-driver-25.5.0

steps.title: 安装Toolkit
commands:
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-toolkit-8.5.0
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-310p-ops-8.5.0

steps.title: 安装后验证
commands:
# 配置环境变量(如下命令以root用户为例，请以实际安装路径为准)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 配置用户属组
commands:
groupadd HwHiAiUser
useradd -g HwHiAiUser -d /home/HwHiAiUser -m HwHiAiUser -s /bin/bash

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands:

sudo curl https://repo.oepkgs.net/ascend/cann/ascend.repo -o /etc/yum.repos.d/ascend.repo && yum makecache 
sudo yum install -y Ascend-hdk-910-npu-driver-25.5.0

steps.title: 安装Toolkit
commands:
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-toolkit-8.5.0
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-910-ops-8.5.0

steps.title: 安装后验证
commands:
# 配置环境变量(如下命令以root用户为例，请以实际安装路径为准)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 配置用户属组
commands:
groupadd HwHiAiUser
useradd -g HwHiAiUser -d /home/HwHiAiUser -m HwHiAiUser -s /bin/bash

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands:
sudo yum makecache
sudo yum install -y gcc python3 python3-pip kernel-headers-$(uname -r) kernel-devel-$(uname -r)

steps.title: 安装CANN（驱动+Toolkit）
commands:
#Ascend-cann为驱动、Toolkit合一包
wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/CANN/CANN%208.5.T63/Ascend-cann_8.5.0_linux-aarch64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann_8.5.0_linux-aarch64.run --install

wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/CANN/CANN%208.5.T63/Ascend-cann-910-ops_8.5.0_linux-aarch64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann-910-ops_8.5.0_linux-aarch64.run --install

steps.title: 安装后验证
commands:
# 配置环境变量(如下命令以root用户为例，请以实际安装路径为准)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 安装Toolkit
commands:
#conda所在目录需有755权限
conda config --add channels https://repo.huaweicloud.com/ascend/repos/conda/ 
conda install ascend::cann-toolkit==8.5.0
conda install ascend::cann-910-ops==8.5.0

steps.title: 安装后验证
commands:
source /home/miniconda3/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

# 配置环境变量(如下命令以root用户为例，请以实际安装路径为准)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 配置用户属组
commands:
groupadd HwHiAiUser
useradd -g HwHiAiUser -d /home/HwHiAiUser -m HwHiAiUser -s /bin/bash

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands:
sudo yum makecache
sudo yum install -y gcc python3 python3-pip kernel-headers-$(uname -r) kernel-devel-$(uname -r)

steps.title: 安装CANN（驱动+Toolkit）
commands:
#Ascend-cann为驱动、Toolkit合一包
wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/CANN/CANN%208.5.T63/Ascend-cann_8.5.0_linux-aarch64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann_8.5.0_linux-aarch64.run --install

wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/CANN/CANN%208.5.T63/Ascend-cann-910-ops_8.5.0_linux-aarch64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann-910-ops_8.5.0_linux-aarch64.run --install

steps.title: 安装后验证
commands:
# 配置环境变量(如下命令以root用户为例，请以实际安装路径为准)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 安装Toolkit
commands:
#conda所在目录需有755权限
conda config --add channels https://repo.huaweicloud.com/ascend/repos/conda/ 
conda install ascend::cann-toolkit==8.5.0
conda install ascend::cann-910-ops==8.5.0

sudo apt-get install -y gcc python3 python3-pip linux-headers-$(uname -r)

steps.title: 安装CANN（驱动+Toolkit）
commands:
#Ascend-cann为驱动、Toolkit合一包
wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/CANN/CANN%208.5.T63/Ascend-cann_8.5.0_linux-aarch64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann_8.5.0_linux-aarch64.run --install

wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/CANN/CANN%208.5.T63/Ascend-cann-910b-ops_8.5.0_linux-aarch64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann-910b-ops_8.5.0_linux-aarch64.run --install

steps.title: 安装后验证
commands:
# 配置环境变量(如下命令以root用户为例，请以实际安装路径为准)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 安装Toolkit
commands:
#conda所在目录需有755权限
conda config --add channels https://repo.huaweicloud.com/ascend/repos/conda/ 
conda install ascend::cann-toolkit==8.5.0
conda install ascend::cann-910b-ops==8.5.0

steps.title: 安装后验证
commands:
source /home/miniconda3/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 配置用户属组
commands:
groupadd HwHiAiUser
useradd -g HwHiAiUser -d /home/HwHiAiUser -m HwHiAiUser -s /bin/bash

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands:
sudo yum makecache
sudo yum install -y gcc python3 python3-pip kernel-headers-$(uname -r) kernel-devel-$(uname -r)

steps.title: 安装NPU驱动
commands:
sudo curl https://repo.oepkgs.net/ascend/cann/ascend.repo -o /etc/yum.repos.d/ascend.repo && yum makecache 
sudo yum install -y Ascend910B-driver-25.5.0

steps.title: 安装Toolkit
commands:
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-toolkit-8.5.0
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-910b-ops-8.5.0

steps.title: 安装后验证
commands:
# 配置环境变量(如下命令以root用户为例，请以实际安装路径为准)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

#conda所在目录需有755权限
conda config --add channels https://repo.huaweicloud.com/ascend/repos/conda/ 
conda install ascend::cann-toolkit==8.5.0
conda install ascend::cann-a3-ops==8.5.0

steps.title: 安装后验证
commands:
source /home/miniconda3/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 配置用户属组
commands:
groupadd HwHiAiUser
useradd -g HwHiAiUser -d /home/HwHiAiUser -m HwHiAiUser -s /bin/bash

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands:
sudo yum makecache
sudo yum install -y gcc python3 python3-pip kernel-headers-$(uname -r) kernel-devel-$(uname -r)

steps.title: 安装NPU驱动
commands:
sudo curl https://repo.oepkgs.net/ascend/cann/ascend.repo -o /etc/yum.repos.d/ascend.repo && yum makecache 
sudo yum install -y Atlas-A3-hdk-npu-driver-25.5.0

steps.title: 安装Toolkit
commands:
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-toolkit-8.5.0
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-A3-ops-8.5.0

steps.title: 安装后验证
commands:
# 配置环境变量(如下命令以root用户为例，请以实际安装路径为准)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 配置用户属组
commands:
groupadd HwHiAiUser
useradd -g HwHiAiUser -d /home/HwHiAiUser -m HwHiAiUser -s /bin/bash

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands:
sudo yum makecache
sudo yum install -y gcc python3 python3-pip kernel-headers-$(uname -r) kernel-devel-$(uname -r)

steps.title: 安装CANN（驱动+Toolkit）
commands:

wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/CANN/CANN%208.5.T63/Ascend-cann_8.5.0_linux-aarch64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann_8.5.0_linux-aarch64.run --install

wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/CANN/CANN%208.5.T63/Ascend-cann-A3-ops_8.5.0_linux-aarch64.run

# 配置环境变量(如下命令以root用户为例，请以实际安装路径为准)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 安装Toolkit
commands:
#conda所在目录需有755权限
conda config --add channels https://repo.huaweicloud.com/ascend/repos/conda/ 
conda install ascend::cann-toolkit==8.5.0
conda install ascend::cann-a3-ops==8.5.0

steps.title: 安装后验证
commands:
source /home/miniconda3/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 配置用户属组
commands:
groupadd HwHiAiUser
useradd -g HwHiAiUser -d /home/HwHiAiUser -m HwHiAiUser -s /bin/bash

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands:
sudo yum makecache
sudo yum install -y gcc python3 python3-pip kernel-headers-$(uname -r) kernel-devel-$(uname -r)

steps.title: 安装NPU驱动
commands:
sudo curl https://repo.oepkgs.net/ascend/cann/ascend.repo -o /etc/yum.repos.d/ascend.repo && yum makecache 
sudo yum install -y Atlas-A3-hdk-npu-driver-25.5.0

steps.title: 安装Toolkit
commands:
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-toolkit-8.5.0
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-A3-ops-8.5.0

useradd -g HwHiAiUser -d /home/HwHiAiUser -m HwHiAiUser -s /bin/bash

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands:
sudo yum makecache
sudo yum install -y gcc python3 python3-pip kernel-headers-$(uname -r) kernel-devel-$(uname -r)

steps.title: 安装NPU驱动
commands:
sudo curl https://repo.oepkgs.net/ascend/cann/ascend.repo -o /etc/yum.repos.d/ascend.repo && yum makecache 
sudo yum install -y Atlas-A3-hdk-npu-driver-25.5.0

steps.title: 安装Toolkit
commands:
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-toolkit-8.5.0
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-A3-ops-8.5.0

steps.title: 安装后验证
commands:
# 配置环境变量(如下命令以root用户为例，请以实际安装路径为准)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 配置用户属组
commands:
groupadd HwHiAiUser

commands:
# 安装Toolkit开发套件包
wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/Milan-ASL/Milan-ASL%20V100R001C25B800TP028/Ascend-cann-toolkit_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-aarch64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann-toolkit_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-aarch64.run --install

# 安装Kernels算子包
wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/Milan-ASL/Milan-ASL%20V100R001C25B800TP028/Ascend-cann-kernels-310b_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-aarch64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann-kernels-310b_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-aarch64.run --install

steps.title: 样例运行
commands:
# 配置环境变量(root用户为例)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 安装CANN
commands:
# 安装Toolkit开发套件包
conda config --add channels https://repo.huaweicloud.com/ascend/repos/conda/ 
conda install ascend::cann-toolkit==8.5.0.alpha002

# 安装Kernels算子包
conda install ascend::cann-kernels-310b==8.5.0.alpha002

sudo yum install -y gcc python3 python3-pip kernel-headers-$(uname -r) kernel-devel-$(uname -r)

steps.title: 安装NPU驱动
commands:
sudo curl https://repo.oepkgs.net/ascend/cann/ascend.repo -o /etc/yum.repos.d/ascend.repo && yum makecache 
sudo yum install -y Ascend-hdk-310p-npu-driver-25.5.0

steps.title: 安装CANN
commands:
# 安装Toolkit开发套件包
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-toolkit-8.5.0.alpha002

# 安装Kernels算子包
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-kernels-310p-8.5.0.alpha002

steps.title: 样例运行
commands:
# 配置环境变量(root用户为例)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

commands: sudo yum install -y python3 python3-pip

useradd -g HwHiAiUser -d /home/HwHiAiUser -m HwHiAiUser -s /bin/bash

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands:
sudo yum makecache
sudo yum install -y gcc python3 python3-pip kernel-headers-$(uname -r) kernel-devel-$(uname -r)

steps.title: 安装NPU驱动
commands:
sudo curl https://repo.oepkgs.net/ascend/cann/ascend.repo -o /etc/yum.repos.d/ascend.repo && yum makecache 
sudo yum install -y Ascend-hdk-310p-npu-driver-25.5.0

steps.title: 安装CANN
commands:
# 安装Toolkit开发套件包
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-toolkit-8.5.0.alpha002

# 安装Kernels算子包
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-kernels-310p-8.5.0.alpha002

steps.title: 样例运行
commands:
# 配置环境变量(root用户为例)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands: sudo yum install -y python3 python3-pip

# 配置环境变量(root用户为例)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands: sudo yum install -y python3 python3-pip

steps.title: 安装CANN
commands:
# 安装Toolkit开发套件包
wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/Milan-ASL/Milan-ASL%20V100R001C25B800TP028/Ascend-cann-toolkit_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-x86_64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann-toolkit_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-x86_64.run --install

# 安装Kernels算子包
wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/Milan-ASL/Milan-ASL%20V100R001C25B800TP028/Ascend-cann-kernels-310p_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-x86_64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann-kernels-310p_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-x86_64.run --install

steps.title: 样例运行
commands:
# 配置环境变量(root用户为例)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 安装CANN
commands:
# 安装Toolkit开发套件包
conda config --add channels https://repo.huaweicloud.com/ascend/repos/conda/ 
conda install ascend::cann-toolkit==8.5.0.alpha002

# 安装Kernels算子包
conda install ascend::cann-kernels-310p==8.5.0.alpha002

steps.title: 样例运行
commands:
source /home/miniconda3/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh
python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 配置用户属组
commands:
groupadd HwHiAiUser
useradd -g HwHiAiUser -d /home/HwHiAiUser -m HwHiAiUser -s /bin/bash

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands:
sudo yum makecache
sudo yum install -y gcc python3 python3-pip kernel-headers-$(uname -r) kernel-devel-$(uname -r)

steps.title: 安装NPU驱动
commands:
sudo curl https://repo.oepkgs.net/ascend/cann/ascend.repo -o /etc/yum.repos.d/ascend.repo && yum makecache 
sudo yum install -y Ascend-hdk-310p-npu-driver-25.5.0

commands:

sudo yum install -y gcc python3 python3-pip kernel-headers-$(uname -r) kernel-devel-$(uname -r)

steps.title: 安装NPU驱动
commands:
sudo curl https://repo.oepkgs.net/ascend/cann/ascend.repo -o /etc/yum.repos.d/ascend.repo && yum makecache 
sudo yum install -y Ascend-hdk-910-npu-driver-25.5.0

steps.title: 安装CANN
commands:
# 安装Toolkit开发套件包
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-toolkit-8.5.0.alpha002

# 安装Kernels算子包
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-kernels-910-8.5.0.alpha002

commands:
# 配置环境变量(root用户为例)

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

# 安装Toolkit开发套件包
wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/Milan-ASL/Milan-ASL%20V100R001C25B800TP028/Ascend-cann-toolkit_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-x86_64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann-toolkit_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-x86_64.run --install

# 安装Kernels算子包
wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/Milan-ASL/Milan-ASL%20V100R001C25B800TP028/Ascend-cann-kernels-910_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-x86_64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann-kernels-910_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-x86_64.run --install

steps.title: 样例运行
commands:
# 配置环境变量(root用户为例)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 安装CANN
commands:
# 安装Toolkit开发套件包
conda config --add channels https://repo.huaweicloud.com/ascend/repos/conda/ 
conda install ascend::cann-toolkit==8.5.0.alpha002

# 安装Kernels算子包
conda install ascend::cann-kernels-910==8.5.0.alpha002

steps.title: 样例运行
commands:
source /home/miniconda3/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh
python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 配置用户属组
commands:
groupadd HwHiAiUser
useradd -g HwHiAiUser -d /home/HwHiAiUser -m HwHiAiUser -s /bin/bash

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands:
sudo yum makecache
sudo yum install -y gcc python3 python3-pip kernel-headers-$(uname -r) kernel-devel-$(uname -r)

steps.title: 安装NPU驱动
commands:
sudo curl https://repo.oepkgs.net/ascend/cann/ascend.repo -o /etc/yum.repos.d/ascend.repo && yum makecache 
sudo yum install -y Ascend-hdk-910-npu-driver-25.5.0

steps.title: 安装CANN
commands:
# 安装Toolkit开发套件包
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-toolkit-8.5.0.alpha002

# 安装Kernels算子包
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-kernels-910-8.5.0.alpha002

sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-toolkit-8.5.0.alpha002

# 安装Kernels算子包
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-kernels-910b-8.5.0.alpha002

steps.title: 样例运行
commands:
# 配置环境变量(root用户为例)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands: sudo yum install -y python3 python3-pip

steps.title: 安装CANN
commands:
# 安装Toolkit开发套件包
wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/Milan-ASL/Milan-ASL%20V100R001C25B800TP028/Ascend-cann-toolkit_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-aarch64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann-toolkit_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-aarch64.run --install

# 安装Kernels算子包
wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/Milan-ASL/Milan-ASL%20V100R001C25B800TP028/Ascend-cann-kernels-910b_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-aarch64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann-kernels-910b_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-aarch64.run --install

steps.title: 样例运行
commands:
# 配置环境变量(root用户为例)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 安装CANN
commands:
# 安装Toolkit开发套件包
conda config --add channels https://repo.huaweicloud.com/ascend/repos/conda/ 
conda install ascend::cann-toolkit==8.5.0.alpha002

# 安装Kernels算子包
conda install ascend::cann-kernels-910b==8.5.0.alpha002

steps.title: 样例运行
commands:
source /home/miniconda3/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh
python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 配置用户属组
commands:
groupadd HwHiAiUser
useradd -g HwHiAiUser -d /home/HwHiAiUser -m HwHiAiUser -s /bin/bash

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands:
sudo yum makecache
sudo yum install -y gcc python3 python3-pip kernel-headers-$(uname -r) kernel-devel-$(uname -r)

steps.title: 安装NPU驱动
commands:
sudo curl https://repo.oepkgs.net/ascend/cann/ascend.repo -o /etc/yum.repos.d/ascend.repo && yum makecache 
sudo yum install -y Ascend910B-driver-25.5.0

sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-toolkit-8.5.0.alpha002

# 安装Kernels算子包
sudo yum install -y Ascend-cann-kernels-910b-8.5.0.alpha002

steps.title: 样例运行
commands:
# 配置环境变量(root用户为例)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands: sudo yum install -y python3 python3-pip

steps.title: 安装CANN
commands:
# 安装Toolkit开发套件包
wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/Milan-ASL/Milan-ASL%20V100R001C25B800TP028/Ascend-cann-toolkit_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-x86_64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann-toolkit_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-x86_64.run --install

# 安装Kernels算子包
wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/Milan-ASL/Milan-ASL%20V100R001C25B800TP028/Ascend-cann-kernels-910b_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-x86_64.run

commands:
sudo yum makecache
sudo yum install -y gcc python3 python3-pip kernel-headers-$(uname -r) kernel-devel-$(uname -r)

commands:
sudo curl https://repo.oepkgs.net/ascend/cann/ascend.repo -o /etc/yum.repos.d/ascend.repo && yum makecache 
sudo yum install -y Ascend910B-driver-25.5.0

source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands: sudo yum install -y python3 python3-pip

steps.title: 安装CANN
commands:
# 安装Toolkit开发套件包
wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/Milan-ASL/Milan-ASL%20V100R001C25B800TP028/Ascend-cann-toolkit_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-aarch64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann-toolkit_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-aarch64.run --install

# 安装Kernels算子包
wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/Milan-ASL/Milan-ASL%20V100R001C25B800TP028/Atlas-A3-cann-kernels_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-aarch64.run
bash ./Atlas-A3-cann-kernels_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-aarch64.run --install

steps.title: 样例运行
commands:
# 配置环境变量(root用户为例)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 安装CANN
commands:
# 安装Toolkit开发套件包
conda config --add channels https://repo.huaweicloud.com/ascend/repos/conda/ 
conda install ascend::cann-toolkit==8.5.0.alpha002

# 安装Kernels算子包
conda install ascend::a3-cann-kernels==8.5.0.alpha002

steps.title: 样例运行
commands:
source /home/miniconda3/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh
python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 配置用户属组
commands:
groupadd HwHiAiUser
useradd -g HwHiAiUser -d /home/HwHiAiUser -m HwHiAiUser -s /bin/bash

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands:
sudo yum makecache
sudo yum install -y gcc python3 python3-pip kernel-headers-$(uname -r) kernel-devel-$(uname -r)

steps.title: 安装NPU驱动
commands:
sudo curl https://repo.oepkgs.net/ascend/cann/ascend.repo -o /etc/yum.repos.d/ascend.repo && yum makecache 
sudo yum install -y Atlas-A3-hdk-npu-driver

# 配置环境变量(root用户为例)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands: sudo yum install -y python3 python3-pip

steps.title: 安装CANN
commands:
# 安装Toolkit开发套件包
wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/Milan-ASL/Milan-ASL%20V100R001C25B800TP028/Ascend-cann-toolkit_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-x86_64.run
bash ./Ascend-cann-toolkit_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-x86_64.run --install

# 安装Kernels算子包
wget https://ascend-repo.obs.cn-east-2.myhuaweicloud.com/Milan-ASL/Milan-ASL%20V100R001C25B800TP028/Atlas-A3-cann-kernels_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-x86_64.run
bash ./Atlas-A3-cann-kernels_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-x86_64.run --install

steps.title: 样例运行
commands:
# 配置环境变量(root用户为例)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 安装CANN
commands:
# 安装Toolkit开发套件包
conda config --add channels https://repo.huaweicloud.com/ascend/repos/conda/ 
conda install ascend::cann-toolkit==8.5.0.alpha002

# 安装Kernels算子包
conda install ascend::a3-cann-kernels==8.5.0.alpha002

steps.title: 样例运行
commands:
source /home/miniconda3/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh
python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 配置用户属组
commands:
groupadd HwHiAiUser
useradd -g HwHiAiUser -d /home/HwHiAiUser -m HwHiAiUser -s /bin/bash

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands:
sudo yum makecache
sudo yum install -y gcc python3 python3-pip kernel-headers-$(uname -r) kernel-devel-$(uname -r)

steps.title: 安装NPU驱动
commands:
sudo curl https://repo.oepkgs.net/ascend/cann/ascend.repo -o /etc/yum.repos.d/ascend.repo && yum makecache 
sudo yum install -y Atlas-A3-hdk-npu-driver

bash ./Atlas-A3-cann-kernels_8.5.0.alpha002_linux-x86_64.run --install

steps.title: 样例运行
commands:
# 配置环境变量(root用户为例)
source /usr/local/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh

python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 安装CANN
commands:
# 安装Toolkit开发套件包
conda config --add channels https://repo.huaweicloud.com/ascend/repos/conda/ 
conda install ascend::cann-toolkit==8.5.0.alpha002

# 安装Kernels算子包
conda install ascend::a3-cann-kernels==8.5.0.alpha002

steps.title: 样例运行
commands:
source /home/miniconda3/Ascend/ascend-toolkit/set_env.sh
python3 -c "import acl;print(acl.get_soc_name())"

steps.title: 配置用户属组
commands:
groupadd HwHiAiUser
useradd -g HwHiAiUser -d /home/HwHiAiUser -m HwHiAiUser -s /bin/bash

steps.title: 安装依赖
commands:
sudo yum makecache
sudo yum install -y gcc python3 python3-pip kernel-headers-$(uname -r) kernel-devel-$(uname -r)

steps.title: 安装NPU驱动
commands:
sudo curl https://repo.oepkgs.net/ascend/cann/ascend.repo -o /etc/yum.repos.d/ascend.repo && yum makecache 
sudo yum install -y Atlas-A3-hdk-npu-driver
